Descriptor of temporary filebacked "big.matrix"

Descriptor of temporary filebacked "big.matrix"

tmpFBM(n, m, type = "double", init = NULL)

Arguments

n

Number of rows.
m

Number of columns.
type

The type of the atomic element. Default is double.
init

A scalar value for initializing the matrix. Default is NULL, which avoids unnecessary time spent doing the initializing.

Value

A descriptor of a big.matrix, filebacked in directory "/tmp/".

Examples

X.desc <- tmpFBM(10, 10)
str(X.desc)
#> Formal class 'big.matrix.descriptor' [package "bigmemory"] with 1 slot
#>   ..@ description:List of 13
#>   .. ..$ sharedType: chr "FileBacked"
#>   .. ..$ filename  : chr "file7bd5df8b7fa"
#>   .. ..$ dirname   : chr "/tmp/Rtmp0Ofs3X/"
#>   .. ..$ totalRows : num 10
#>   .. ..$ totalCols : num 10
#>   .. ..$ rowOffset : num 0
#>   .. ..$ colOffset : num 0
#>   .. ..$ nrow      : num 10
#>   .. ..$ ncol      : num 10
#>   .. ..$ rowNames  : NULL
#>   .. ..$ colNames  : NULL
#>   .. ..$ type      : chr "double"
#>   .. ..$ separated : logi FALSE
